HiddenText.Name: Do I need an ecclesiastical endorsement to take the courses?
HiddenText.OpenningText: Do I need an ecclesiastical endorsement to take the courses?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Yes. Each prospective student will need an ecclesiastical endorsement from their local church leader.  Members of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints will receive this endorsement from their bishop and stake president.
